Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it at an introductory price of $9,500. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive the most out of your investment while staying within your budget considerations. Should you have any questions or need further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
